description: Displays the properties of a FHIR export job, including the ID, ARN, name, and the status of the job.

parameters.name: DatastoreId
parameters.description: The AWS generated ID for the data store from which files are being exported from for an export job.

parameters.name: JobId
parameters.description: The AWS generated ID for an export job.

nested_items.name: ExportJobProperties
nested_items.description: Displays the properties of the export job, including the ID, Arn, Name, and the status of the job.

nested_items.name: JobId
nested_items.description: The AWS generated ID for an export job.

nested_items.name: JobName
nested_items.description: The user generated name for an export job.

nested_items.name: JobStatus
nested_items.description: The status of a FHIR export job. Possible statuses are SUBMITTED, IN_PROGRESS, COMPLETED, or FAILED.

nested_items.name: SubmitTime
nested_items.description: The time an export job was initiated.

nested_items.name: EndTime
nested_items.description: The time an export job completed.

nested_items.name: DatastoreId
nested_items.description: The AWS generated ID for the data store from which files are being exported for an export job.

nested_items.name: OutputDataConfig
nested_items.description: The output data configuration that was supplied when the export job was created.

nested_items.name: S3Configuration
nested_items.description: The output data configuration that was supplied when the export job was created.

nested_items.name: S3Uri
nested_items.description: The S3Uri is the user specified S3 location of the FHIR data to be imported into AWS HealthLake.

nested_items.name: KmsKeyId
nested_items.description: The KMS key ID used to access the S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: DataAccessRoleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name used during the initiation of the job.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: An explanation of any errors that may have occurred during the export job.
